markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Biloko Veteran](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1428)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A biloko who has led a sufficient number of successful hunts garners the respect (and fear) of their companions.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Biloko Veteran](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1428)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +10, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 58

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 2d8+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longspear +12 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +12 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 18
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

**Inspired Feast**  ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) If a biloko feasts on a [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour.

**Swipe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the biloko veteran's multiple attack penalty.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-108" />
name: Biloko Veteran

text: Biloko Veteran A biloko who has led a sufficient number of successful hunts garners the respect (and fear) of their companions. Recall Knowledge - Fey (Nature): DC 19 Unspecific Lore : DC 17 Specific Lore : DC 14 Biloko Veteran Source The Mwangi Expanse pg. 294 2.0 , Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders pg. 82 Perception +11; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Mwangi, Sylvan Skills Athletics +10, Crafting +10, Intimidation +12, Nature +9, Stealth +13, Survival +11 Str +4 Dex +4 Con +0 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +2 Items Longspear, Shortbow (20 arrows) --- AC 21 Fort +8 Ref +14 Will +11 HP 58 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action jaws +12, Damage 2d8+4 piercing Melee Single Action longspear +12 (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d8+4 piercing Ranged Single Action shortbow +12 (deadly d10, range increment 60 feet, reload 0), Damage 1d6+4 piercing Primal Innate Spells DC 18 - 1st Charm Inspired Feast (Emotion, Mental) If a biloko feasts on a human corpse for 1 minute or more, they gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 hour. Swipe Two Actions The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the biloko veteran's multiple attack penalty.
